sentences.en: At one point last week shares in the grey market touched 230p.
sentences.cn: 上周，灰市上的股票价格一度高达230便士。

sentences.en: Disappointingly, this show is only on view for a week.
sentences.cn: 令人失望的是，这次展览仅持续一周。

sentences.en: I can’t see you this week.
I have a manicure and a pedicure every week.
sentences.cn: 我每周做一次指甲护理和足部护理。

sentences.en: Lung cells die and are replaced about once a week.
sentences.cn: 肺细胞约每周新老更替一次。

sentences.en: Meat was available once a week if at all.
sentences.cn: 就算有肉，也是每周才吃一次。

sentences.en: New diet books appear at a rate of nearly one a week.
sentences.cn: 新的饮食类书籍差不多一周出一本。

sentences.en: Somalia, pop. 7.9 million, income per head about £1.60 a week.
sentences.cn: 索马里，人口790万，人均收入大约每周1.60英镑。

sentences.en: The news programme goes out four times a week at peak time.
sentences.cn: 这档新闻节目每周在黄金时段播出4次。

sentences.en: The Tundra Times, a weekly newspaper in Alaska, ceased publication this week.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加的周报《苔原时报》本周停刊了。

sentences.en: The volunteers kept a record of everything they ate for a week.
sentences.cn: 志愿者记录下他们一周所吃的所有食物。

sentences.en: These programmes are each watched by around 19 million viewers every week.
sentences.cn: 这些电视节目的观众各自都在每周1,900万左右。

sentences.en: They drew up the design for the house in a week.
sentences.cn: 他们在一周内就画出了房子的图样。

sentences.en: This week, the company mailed out its annual report.
sentences.cn: 本周该公司群发了其年度报告。

sentences.en: We tend to meet up for lunch once a week.
sentences.cn: 我们往往每周共进一次午餐。

sentences.en: we'll be back a week on Friday.
sentences.cn: 我们一周之后的星期五返回。

sentences.en: What price a glorious repeat of last week's triumph?
sentences.cn: 还有可能再次上演上周的辉煌胜利吗？

words.tran_cn: 每周的；周刊的；一周一次的

phrases.tran_cn: 商业周刊（美国商业类杂志）
每周三次，一个礼拜三次

trans.tran_cn: 周，星期，一周时间，工作周
trans.tran_en: a period of seven days and nights, usually measured in Britain from Monday to Sunday and in the US from Sunday to Saturday
